text: The Ambrose Burton House, located on Unity Rd. near Harrodsburg, Kentucky, was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1983. It is believed to have been built by Ambrose Burton in 1798. The house is a two-story log building with a single room on each floor. It is in plan. With . ==References== Category:Houses on the National Register of Historic Places in Kentucky Category:Mercer County, Kentucky
title: Ambrose Burton House
